system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.53RM572RAaaWLZqq]{Simple Weapon Specialist (Tool hammer or Sledgehammer)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.uR1tAu3dJH914reS]{Blunt Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.v98JAz1seou9P609]{Hammer Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding the hammer chosen from the Simple Weapon Specialist feat, the Critical Threat range is 12-18.
